name: Ultimate IPCA Game Jam18 Deluxe
description:
Ultimate IPCA Game Jam18 Deluxe Luv From All Prespectives A Game Jam Dating Simulator From a Weeb Animu Desu 3000 Retrospective, is a game jam dating simulator set in the same game jam where it was created. 

The player, who doesn't have a team yet, is late to the game jam and ends up joining the creators' team, that still have room for one more person.

The main objective is for the player to develop a romantic relationship with one of the four jammers.

The game approaches the theme from the "interpersonal perspective" and how it influences people in social context, however the game is also meant as a satire of the dating sim genre and how these types of games tend to be superficial when approaching this topic.

This was our take on the theme "prespective" for the IPCA Game Jam 2018 and was made in 48h.
